name: Forgotten Soul (Michael Matalliotakis, korsik, kdiakogiannis)
description:
An atmospheric first person horror game.
The player has to find clues about the situation surrounding him/her all over the environment. 
Find the clues to unravel the mystery.

CONTROLS

Movement: WASD 

Flashlight: X

Flashlight power: E (while flashlight is active)

Collect clue: F
